Html:
Hello, I have a problem with a context menu.

I'm trying to insert menu with such code:

<src:Map>
<src:Map.ContextMenu>
<ContextMenu Name="MapContextMenu">
 <MenuItem Header="Set as target" Click="SetTargetMenuItem_Click"/>
</ContextMenu>
</src:Map.ContextMenu>

 

 

But I can't see this menu. It's seems like it appears under the map - not on the top. It's invisble, but I can click menuitem.

Can you help me with this problem?

Thank you
I've restarted my computer and it works... I cab't explain it. Sorry
